item.title: Atomic Note
item.description: Atomic Note An Atomic Note is a note on a single thought/idea. Consider these points when making a note: Why is it important to me? Is it inspiring? Can I make use of the information? Is it hard to find the particular piece of information? Was it hard earnt information/knowledge? What is this related to? Should I link to/from the related notes? Should I use a particular tag to group this note with similiar notes?
